verses.roman:
tomā-saba nā chāḍiba, yāvat āmi jība'
mātāre tāvat āmi chāḍite nāriba

synonyms: tomā-saba—all of you; nā—not; chāḍiba—I shall give up; yāvat—as long as; āmi—I; jība—shall live or shall remain manifest; mātāre—mother; tāvat—that long; āmi—I; chāḍite—to give up; nāriba—shall be unable.
translation: "My dear friends, as long as I remain manifest, I shall never give you up. Nor shall I be able to give up My mother.
